definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
abbr. for 柬埔寨[Jian3 pu3 zhai4], Cambodia
the still of the night (idiom)/late at night
late at night/in the dead of night
(literary) crisscross/uneven/disorderly/rim of the eye/variant of 欄杆|栏杆[lan2 gan1]
variant of 勾欄|勾栏[gou1 lan2]
to leave impulsively/to send out (merchandise) without authorization

sentences.english: Finally, design the variable diaphragm. This system fully meet the requirements of actual use.
sentences.chinese: 最后对可变光阑进行设计，完全满足实际使用要求。

sentences.english: Generalized M2 factor of laser beams with amplitude modulations and phase distortion passing through hard-edge apertures.
sentences.chinese: 部分相干光束通过硬边光阑的推广光束传输M2因子。

sentences.english: The physical stop which corresponds to the entrance window is then the required field stop.
sentences.chinese: 入射窗所对应的实物光阑就是所要求的场光阑。

sentences.english: The physical stop which corresponds to the entrance window is then the required field stop.
sentences.chinese: 入射窗所对应的实物光阑就是所要求的场光阑。

sentences.english: The focal switch of cosine-Gaussian beams focused by a thin lens without aperture is studied in detail.
sentences.chinese: 研究了余弦高斯光束通过无光阑透镜后的焦开关现象。

sentences.english: Wine Lang prefer group tea bitter, West Side Story cheap Swiss brain incense.
sentences.chinese: 酒阑更喜团茶苦，梦断偏宜瑞脑香。

sentences.english: The new dawn cold, heliotropes Huang, spring stop.
sentences.chinese: 鸡鸣紫陌曙光寒，莺啭皇州春色阑。

sentences.english: The focal spot, size depend on the pinhole diaphragm diameter of spatial filter.
sentences.chinese: 光斑尺寸和空间滤波系统的针孔光阑直径有关。

sentences.english: The field of view can be limited by inserting a stop in the focal plane of microscope.
sentences.chinese: 可以在显微镜的焦平面上加装一光阑，从而限制视区。

sentences.english: Jan Brehm of Portland woke up from a dream confused and shaken to her core.
sentences.chinese: 波特兰的简布阑从梦中惊醒，内心惶惑。

sentences.english: Essentially, the field stop of the eyepiece encompasses a linear field of view from the telescope.
sentences.chinese: 从本质上讲，目镜的视场光阑与望远镜有线性关系。

sentences.english: Using ray-matrix method we investigated the resonators containing two kinds of apertures.
sentences.chinese: 用光线矩阵方法研究了两类带有光阑的谐振腔。

definition: late at night/in the dead of night
oriole or various birds of the Sylvidae family including warblers
see 徘徊[pai2 huai2], to dither/to hesitate/to pace back and forth/irresolute
umber-black dye for painting the eyebrow
